Text: Did you notice how big the file is?? Thanks for your effort, but to me it's not worth the bandwidth. (Though I guess it would be if I was taking this class.) There are tools to help you make a file like this more usable -- Acrobat Pro for instance. Also Scantailor, which can convert page images to black/white from color or greyscale, which these obviously must be, and otherwise manipulate pages to make them look good.
Thank you so much. I got a Distinction for my marketing subject by reading this...GOD BLESS the one who uploaded this even the file is too big
